lyrics:
9 contributorsu got nerve lyricsintro
uh come on
watch out come on yeah
come on come on

verse 1
gave you chances on top of chances
opportunities taken for granted watch out
my reality is all your infidelities
cause insanity why you askin me
took my kindness for sign of weakness watch out
my own blindness cause my sadness
no longer am i a slave over your madness watch out
i am glad its finally over watch out

chorus
who do you think you are now
i cant believe youve got the nerve boy
who do you think you are now
i cant believe youve got the nerve boy

verse 2
see im tired of all the games
that you seem to like to play
see what you can do for me
is forget you knew my name watch out
see your qualities are less than pleasing uh
i got more than one reason for leaving watch out
its time to close shop open new chapters
see new beginnings is what im after
get your skeletons up out my closet
dont make me lose it watch out i just might lose it watch out
you might also likechorus

i cant believe cant believe youve got the nerve boy yeah
who do you think you yeah are now yeah
i cant believe youve got the nerve boy

see what you need to do is forget you knew my name
im a play ya til youve left cause you talkin me to death
